#summary Setup development environment
#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation
= Introduction =

This is a small howto to set up the development environment.


= Steps =

  # Check out trunk with subversion.
  # Install Google Web Toolkit http://code.google.com/webtoolkit/
  # Create a lib directory in the checkout
  # Get all the dependencies listed in the build.xml file and put into the lib directory.
  # I have checked in my Eclipse project and classpath file as well, you can use these and modify to fit your needs.
